engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.families_impacted_other: Hosting events and having conversations with families who either lost a family member/friend or who are actively impacted.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: Identifying ways to connect with this population. We are looking to conduct a community needs assessment that will help guide us.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_in_recovery: Identifying ways to connect with this population. We are looking to conduct a community needs assessment that will help guide us.

disparities_assessment.barriers: We will be completing a community needs assessment that we hope will help guide us in addressing these disparities.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: The number of calls logged for mental health or substance use disorder related instances.

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process.

treatment.barriers: Currently looking to pursue a community needs assessment.

recovery_support.barriers: Currently looking to pursue a community needs assessment.

connections_to_care.barriers: Currently looking to pursue a community needs assessment.

how_spent: Increase availability of naloxone and other drugs that treat overdoses for first responders, overdose patients, individuals with OUD and their friends and family, schools, community-based organizations, community navigators and outreach workers, persons being released from jail or prison, or the public
Provide training and education regarding naloxone and other drugs that treat overdoses

additional_comments.general: We are looking to actively engage the community in a needs assessment, ideally looking to partner with Care Mass.
